about_the_game:
Dive into the heart-pounding world of Watch Your Eggs! VR, where survival is your only option. Step into the shoes of Agent Pops, who's on a crucial mission to protect the unhatched Frostwing Penguins' eggs from relentless Icy Land creatures seeking to steal them. Strategize your every move, arm yourself with upgradeable weapons, gather an extraordinary team of penguin allies, and fight off the waves of furious enemies together!

YOU’RE ON A MISSION
The Penguin Egg Watch Agency (PEWA) is an impressive headquarters deep within the heart of Frostwing Kingdom. Hidden from prying eyes, it's a marvel of engineering and ingenuity. Inside, a team of engineers works tirelessly, creating innovative weapons to eliminate Icy Land Creatures and safeguard the Frostwing community.

Your mission is clear – use all the tools you have to protect each unhatched penguin egg.



CREATE A SQUAD OF PENGUIN ALLIES
The more eggs you save, the stronger you become! Each egg hatches into an active squad member, possessing impressive fighting abilities. They have it all – from expert target detection and close combat mastery to the power of healing energy and wizard protection to aid you in this fierce battle for penguins’ future.



PREPARE FOR THE EPIC BATTLE
Equip yourself with an array of powerful, upgradable weapons and strategic maneuvers: throw snowballs, launch rockets, and use boomerang blades or lasers. Freeze your enemies with an hourglass or blow them up with dynamite! Collect golden coins and special rewards to upgrade your tools. Boost your strength by eating fish, and stay safe with armor vests. Need a speed boost? Grab an energy drink for lightning-fast attacks.



MEET YOUR ENEMIES
Fight off mischievous Icy Land creatures – encounter vicious Ice Spiders, the clumsy yet remarkably powerful Snowfoot, and even a mysterious one-eyed monster! Some foes you’ll confront up close, while others require long-range tactics.

Are you all set to embark on this exciting VR adventure? Strategize every step, team up with amazing penguin allies, and protect precious penguin eggs from the waves of mystical snow creatures! Join the game and let the action begin!

name: Watch Your Eggs! Survival VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers

short_description: Experience the thrilling world of Watch Your Eggs! VR, an action-packed first-person shooter game. As Agent Pops, your mission is to protect unhatched Frostwing Penguin eggs from wild Icy Land creatures. Plan your strategy, equip yourself with powerful weapons, and face the wave of furious enemies!
